total_revenue.fx_impact: Revenue would have been ~$503 million higher at constant FX rates

drivers: Growth from Instagram Stories, Instagram Feed, and Facebook News Feed

payments_and_other_fees.context: Lower than Q4 due to post-holiday season decline in Oculus & Portal device sales

europe.context: Slower growth partly due to currency impacts

total_expenses.key_factor: Includes a $3 billion accrual related to the FTC inquiry

expense_growth_excluding_accrual.note: If excluding the $3B accrual, expense growth rate ~46 percentage points lower than reported

legal_and_regulatory.context: FTC inquiry into platform and user data practices

headcount.context: Investments in safety, product innovation, and infrastructure

operating_income.context: Operating margin would have been ~42% without the $3 billion FTC accrual

share_repurchase.context: Class A common stock repurchased in Q1 2019

facebook_dau.leading_markets: Growth led by India, Indonesia, Philippines

dap.context: Daily active people using at least one FB app

map.context: Monthly active people using at least one FB app

principles: Secure data storage outside of high-risk jurisdictions
business_impact_assessment: Encryption not expected to significantly impact ad targeting
Reduced permanence aligns with current ad targeting methods relying on recent data
Some risk from data localization (if blocked in major markets)

regulatory_positioning.goal: Increase trust through democratic processes, reduce reliance on unilateral private decisions

stories_ads.example: Dunkin’ Donuts saw high engagement and lower cost per view

marketplace_ads.success_story: Succulents Box: 18% total sales from Marketplace listings
marketplace_ads.expansion: Extended to more countries, showing positive early results

collaborative_ads.use_case: Brands without direct-to-consumer (D2C) can partner with retailers
collaborative_ads.example: Samsung + Fravega in Argentina: 21% lift in sales

ads_transparency: Expanded ‘Why am I seeing this ad?’
Introduced ‘Why am I seeing this post?’
election_integrity: Ads Library expanded to all ads
ID/location verification for EU political/issue ads
‘Paid for by’ disclosures required in political ads

anti-discrimination_measures.changes: No targeting by age, gender, zip code

expenses_and_investments.full_year_2019_expense_growth: 47% to 55% YoY, up from prior 40% to 50%
expenses_and_investments.impact_of_accrual: Accrual adds ~10 percentage points to expense growth
expenses_and_investments.underlying_trend: Continued heavy investment in safety, product innovation, infrastructure

operating_environment_challenges: Regulatory scrutiny (FTC inquiry and potential fine)
Maintaining user trust amid evolving social and political scrutiny
